评论详情: I ordered these a couple of weeks ago and when I received them, quite a few defects of note: The Waist band was coming apart from the pants in the front. The Left leg is approximately 3 inches longer than the right leg. And in addition to that, there are drops of what appears to have the consistency of gorilla glue on the fabric in 3 different areas. Bummer.
Just what I wanted. Love them!

These pants look good from a distance but up close and actually wearing them is a different story. The fabric is lightweight and soft which is good, but it’s a bad choice for this design. The fabric is shiny like silk and slippery. I tried them on and walked across the room and they began to slide down, and slide down even more when I did the kneel-down test. The fabric has a tiny bit of stretch but not enough because I could see the crotch tearing open if I were to kneel down quickly. The straps are very thin and slippery so they won’t stay bound to each other, so useless. The pockets are too small and the tiny bit of Velcro isn’t a great closure. I also detest the white lettering phrase on the pocket; so cheesy. Niepce makes some nice clothes but these pants are a fail.

评论概述: Comfy. Makes Me Feel Cool Asf.
评论详情: I was nervous about the reviews that said the fabric was "thin and felt cheap". The pair I got look and feel like any pair of comfortable joggers, and I'd even go as far as to say they are a bit heavy too- but in a good way. These are gonna be one of my favorite pairs of pants to wear with my tanks and cropped shirts!  Note: I'm 5'5", 125~lbs. I also have kind of long legs. I ordered a size MEDIUM and they fit perfect if you're intending to wear them up on your mid-section/above the hips and still have leg coverage.

I bought these pants a little over a year ago and stopped wearing them all together as they started falling apart not even 6-8 months after use. The strap got ripped off, the top pocket for the side also got ripped off and not to mention I had a hole pop up right in the crotch after 6 months of use. These pants are cheaply made and will not last. This is not tech wear.

I'm 5'10 160lbs and I got the medium and it's insanely restrictive around the thighs. It fits and feels like snow pants where there's not enough slack or stretch in the material move properly. You won't be doing any knee highs with this nor even a slight split, which might sound like "idc I don't do those anyway" but you're wrong. When you put them on you'll realize how restrictive they are. It feels like at any moment they will split.

As per the title, there is no fly and the waist is a basic sweatpants-style string with no belt loops. Bought for part of a costume so this wasn't that big a problem for me.
Been looking for some good pants that still allowed plenty of flexibility and these are it! Cam bend/squat/stretch with no worry of tearing. Also surprisingly breazy!
True to size, nice stretch in the pants. Feels like quality material.
I wore these a couple times and busted one of the bottom pockets. After contacting the seller they were happy to send me a replacement pair free of charge!
The pants themselves are comfortable but after the first wash the straps were unraveling and coming off the pants. I really like the pants but may need to look into better stitching on straps.

评论概述: Very happy. Quality is solid, looks and feels great!
评论详情: Probably my favorite pants I've bought online. I expected very little considering how tall I am. The pants were a great length and fit well around the waist! Great pants for the price. Will likely grab a few more pairs  Update: I've bought two different pairs from this manufacturer now. The skinny cuff with straps (first) and the basic cargo looking ones (second)  (Right)The first pair is one of my favorite pairs of pants. They look and fit great. I really really like the fabric, stretchy, soft, great color, everything. It's starting to fray a bit in the seat, enough to warrant running a lighter over it. Still, they're great. 10/10  (Left)The basic cargo pants are far less great, but still good. I bought these hoping for more of the same fabric like my first pair and was betrayed. These are plastic. They're fine really, but I'm so disappointed... 5/10 because it's not their fault, I just had unwarranted expectations.  If the manufacturer offered the same fabric from the basic strapped pair I have, I'd buy every offered style.
They look good but after 3 shows they fell apart, literally at the seams. I had to buy another (and last) pair for my upcoming event next weekend. Buy with caution.

They came just as pictured and the fabric is thicker than expected in a good way. The fit was great for my husband, they gave him a fit but baggy look. He’s a 38 and I got an XL. If you want a bit more of a baggier look I’d size up one, but they fit him great.

I am 240~60lb and 5'11, and xxxl fits perfectly. I wear things little loose btw, but just a slight a bit, like not too tight. Strangely my sizing never really changed since I was 190lb. So If you are 5'11, go for xxl (super fit or skinny) or xxxl (chubby to fat). I don't know, maybe cuz I am little chubby, but I think xxl might run little small for a lot of people. Material wise, It's actually very durable and thick. Feels really nice and looks premium when I put them on. I put those things on the side in the side pockets. Not really a big fan of things sticking out or hanging like that. And it looks really nice in the pockets like this. Or maybe you can just cut them off. Anyways, conclusion, a good purchase.

These pants are awesome. Great quality for the price. Fit true to size. A little small in the upper thigh area so if you are looking to have them a little more on the baggy side or are stuck between 2 sizes I would definitely suggest to size up! Love these pants!
My 14yr old son loves it, fits just right and excellent quality. Loved the message on the pocket cover.
Good design and perfect fit.

Most likely this will be returned. It's not like the picture at all. It is built for skinny and short legs. But a size up or 2 if you want the lose look. I'm pretty disappointed this was a Halloween costume. Can't wear it now

For the price, I wasn't expecting much honestly, but these went above and beyond my expectations! They are a nice thick and sturdy material. They are comfortable and the size chart is accurate. 评论概述: Wow, these are some comfy pants!
评论详情: These pants are super comfortable!  I'm 6'2", and purchased an XXL size, and they fit great. The bottom cuffs are adjustable, and add to the unique cut and style of these pants.  They remind me of old school tracksuit pants, but with a much thicker, and more satiny material. You could work out in these things, but mind the straps!  A word about the straps - I wasn't sure I'd like these on the pants, and figured that I could cut them off if I decided that I didn't care for them. The straps look great, and add a lot of style. I'm convinced that I'll even be able to find a practical use for them someday, but haven't figured that part out just yet.  I wear mine both in and out of the house, and plan on getting another pair to just lounge around in.

评论概述: Nice pants but shrank after washing so they don’t fit

I could not find one review stating that the zippers were actual pockets so I took my chances. The cargo pockets have a bungee to tighten the pocket and the flap snaps over. I'm so glad I bought these for my husband. These are perfect for shows this winter considering he's not one to wear a cross body fanny pack. The zipper pockets will come in handy so no one tries to pick pocket him and ample amount of room for what ever he decides to bring.

These pants are real ones, I got car wax all over it, the strapped ripped off (my fault) and all the wax and grease came off in wash. Was able to sew strap back on to luckily. There cool pants for the price, quality is good and pretty comfortable, tight around the ankles but I think it’s meant to be like that. 10/10
Just a solid pair of cool looking pants. Love the pocket space.

I bought these pants for an upcoming cosplay and they’re fantastic! The elastic waistband wants to ride up and there’s not much room in the back, but that’s probably because these are men’s cut pants (so not unexpected!). The slick material feels very durable and all of the decals (pockets, straps, writing, etc.) look nice. The pockets are fully functional with Velcro strips and go quite deep. The straps are adjustable but they don’t have clasps, so I just weaved one end of the strap into the other’s loop and they’ve held just fine. Great fit and overall great product!!

El material es muy bueno, tipo rompevientos, el entubado no aprieta y mantiene su forma después de ponértelo. Ahora respecto a cómo me quedó: Mido 1.82m y peso 80kg, y pedí talla M.
